title: I love him, I want to be hugged by him
overview: An eros drama that tells the love story between an older married woman he meets on a trip and a young man who is attracted to her. Yuichi is slammed on a trip with his lover, Eri, and visits a tourist spot alone, where he meets an older woman, Misa. Yuichi, who has no inn, will stay at Misa's house for a while ...
